name: Coras
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 85

Summary:

Your a cartographer, who travels to the new world in his air baloon to create maps of the local islands

Controls:

A/D: Change Wind direction

Escape: Quit

M: Open Map to draw

1/2/3/4: Change Color

Left Mouse Button: Draw

Right Mouse Button: Erase

Tip: You start in to bottom left corner of the map
